John McDonnell, shadow chancellor, calls for one million people to take to the streets to force Theresa May from power - It comes as left-wing groups plan a mass protest on July 1 aiming to pile the pressure on “Theresa and the terrorists”, the PM's coalition with Northern Ireland’s hardline DUP
